about_the_game:
The inspiration for this game's gameplay comes from This War Of Mine, and it is in third person and first person.
  • If you like This War Of Mine too, then this game is very suitable for you.


Join Our Discord

Mail 386733160@qq.com

Types of Games
This game is a single player Single player control multi characters survival strategy game.

The goal and gameplay rules of the game
The goal of the game is to survive the apocalypse of variation and maintain the character's health and psychological state. Players need to manage resources, develop survival strategies, and decide on their character's actions, including finding food, water sources, building shelters, and manufacturing tools. Players also need to face moral dilemmas, such as whether to steal or harm others in order to survive. The player's decisions will affect the character's psychological state and living environment.


Story Background
In the era of scarce resources and expensive modern medicine, a natural medicine has gradually emerged, claiming that the human brain can serve as a medicine with extremely high nutritional value. So there was a business of illegally acquiring human brains in the city of Aband, involving both living and dead people. However, the prions in the human brain exposed to the air have mutated, becoming a silent infectious disease. The government initiated an emergency evacuation, but some people do not believe in the threat of zombies and would rather stay to protect their meager assets. Due to the fact that prions can only cause humans to become zombies in cases of unnatural death, wealthy individuals are rarely infected. The government abandoned this city, and only some poor people and those left behind in special circumstances were abandoned.


Main characters in the game
The main characters are a group of civilians, each with their own background story. They may be urban residents, displaced refugees, victims of war, etc. Each character has its own characteristics and skills, such as a skilled craftsman, an agile stalker, or a sociable negotiator. Their goal is to survive and help other survivors.


The World View and Map Design of Games
This game takes place in a city after the end of the zombie era, with a box shaped map design that presents a dilapidated style and a terrifying atmosphere. Resources are scarce, buildings are damaged, and streets are filled with ruins and danger. Players need to explore various corners of the city, search for resources, and protect shelters.


Map Design for Games
The game's map is designed based on the layout of a real city, including streets, buildings, and other landmarks. Players can explore different areas, such as abandoned factories and abandoned residential areas

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, there will be dismemberment and blood. Violent behavior such as knives, guns, etc. Drinking, smoking, and other behaviors may also occur.No other illegal activities

name: Prion Virus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10/win11
  • Processor: none
  • Memory: none MB RAM
  • Graphics: none
  • Storage: none MB available space
  • Sound Card: none
  • VR Support: none
  • Additional Notes: none

short_description: In the apocalypse caused by the Prion virus, you need to manipulate your 3 companions to survive in your shelter. When facing survivors like you, killing or assisting is up to you to decide. You can choose to live a miserable life, or you can choose to find a way to save everyone
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Ukrainian, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
